Question.Subject: how do websites make money?
Question.Content:
I was watching the harvey danger team do a lip dub of flagpole sitta ( http://vimeo.com/moogaloop.swf?clip_id=173714&server=vimeo.com&show_title=1&show_byline=1&show_portrait=0&color=&fullscreen=1 ) and at the very end a guy said "we just made a million dollars".
my question is how do sites like google, facebook, but even more so sites like piratebay or digg make money to stay alive and a profit?
Question.ChosenAnswer: 1. Use PHP, and optianally Javascript and flash. 2. Build the website. 3. Adverites a lot! Advertise for $100 or more! 4. Have an advertise option on your page. (First time: AdSense, but later your own: AdSense doesn't give much money). 5. Sell things if you want.

Answer.Content: Because the put adsenses which makes money

1. Use PHP, and optianally Javascript and flash. 2. Build the website. 3. Adverites a lot! Advertise for $100 or more! 4. Have an advertise option on your page. (First time: AdSense, but later your own: AdSense doesn't give much money). 5. Sell things if you want.
First you make your own website.Then put google adsense.
